citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an Attending Veterinarian (AV) under formal arrangements and there is no current, written
Program of Veterinary Care (POVC). The licensee’s previous attending veterinarian stopped seeing patients on July 31,
2025, and the licensee has not entered formal arrangements with a new attending veterinarian.
Employing an attending veterinarian and following their program of veterinary care is critical to evaluating animal health
and well-being, as well as to helping to identify any animal husbandry issues that may affect the animals.
Correct by November 17, 2025, by either employing a full-time attending veterinarian under formal arrangements or have
a written program of veterinary care under formal arrangements with a part-time or consulting veterinarian. The facility
corrected the noncompliance on October 3, 2025, and prior to the exit interview.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility does not have an Attending Veterinarian (AV) under formal arrangements and there is no current, written 
Program of Veterinary Care (POVC). The licensee’s previous attending veterinarian stopped seeing patients on July 31, 
2025, and the licensee has not entered formal arrangements with a new attending veterinarian.  
 
Employing an attending veterinarian and following their program of veterinary care is critical to evaluating animal health 
and well-being, as well as to helping to identify any animal husbandry issues that may affect the animals.  
 
Correct by November 17, 2025, by either employing a full-time attending veterinarian under formal arrangements or have 
a written program of veterinary care under formal arrangements with a part-time or consulting veterinarian. The facility 
corrected the noncompliance on October 3, 2025, and prior to the exit interview. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
